itunes:title: Episode 395 - DB Sports Companion Show 03/13/19 - Are The Browns Legit?
title: Episode 395 - DB Sports Companion Show 03/13/19 - Are The Browns Legit?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway throw down an emergency sports show after the Odell Beckham Jr. trade to the Browns, discuss Bryce Harper to the Phillies, why Gonzaga never wins it all in March, and whether or not it was worth it for Le'Veon Bell to have...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway throw down an emergency sports show after the Odell Beckham Jr. trade to the Browns, discuss Bryce Harper to the Phillies, why Gonzaga never wins it all in March, and whether or not it was worth it for Le'Veon Bell to have sat out all of last season.
